MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML2 postcode area of Biggar. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.30am to make repairs to the overhead line network close to Burnside Cottages and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.15am on the 4th of February 2021.
